title: 이달의소녀탐구 #222 (LOONA TV #222)
summary:
00:02 -- Kim Lip filming early in the morning
00:10 -- Appearance of the neon signs used in the MV such as LOONATIC, 달의 뒷면
(Dark Side of the Moon) and 이클립스 (Eclipse)
00:21 -- Start of the shooting. Quality camera movement by BBC!
00:30 -- Choerry suddenly appears
00:39 -- Kim Lip’s scene where she was running and the electric wires are exploding!
00:42 -- The three girls are together and will continue the taping next episode.
